name: RIPESS Europe asbl
membership: RIPESS EU - Solidarity Economy Europe is member of the RIPESS Intercontinental network
goal: RIPESS Europe is an umbrella of the organisations promoting the Social Solidarity Economy, aiming at the exchange of best practices and the development of active, responsible European citizenship in solidarity with the rest of the global population and future generations. The Association represents all European members at meetings of the Réseau Intercontinental de Promotion de l’Économie Sociale Solidaire (Intercontinental Network for Social  Solidarity Economy).
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Consumer Affairs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Food Safety, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Trade, Youth
euInitiatives: Social Business Initiatives, Circular economy, Social and Solidarity Economy, Social Economy, Cooperatives, Social Rights Pillars, CAP
